snippet: Rescue groups are on the lookout for former racehorses that have landed at auctions and are en route to slaughterhouses in Canada and Mexico.
abstract: Thoroughbred advocates and rescue groups are on lookout for former racehorses that have landed at auctions and are en route to slaughterhouses in Canada and Mexico.
lead_paragraph: Rescue groups are on the lookout for former racehorses that have landed at auctions and are en route to slaughterhouses in Canada and Mexico.

headline.seo: Rescuing Racehorses From Slaughter as Industry Bides Its Time
headline.main: Rescuing Horses as Industry Bides Its Time
headline.print_headline: Rescuing Horses as Industry Bides Its Time
